original_text: God bought you for himself. He paid the price for you. So do not let anyone else make you their slave.
korean_text: 너희는 값으로 사신 것이니 사람들의 종이 되지 말라

sentences.original_text: He paid the price for you.
So do not let anyone else make you their slave.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 다른 사람들이 당신을 노예로 만들도록 허용하지 마십시오.
